Campus Safety
Greek Life
Clubs and Activities

Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Bang for the buck
What to do for fun
Food and Dining
Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments

There is little to no crime on campus as well as there are strategically placed telephones to allow for help in case of an emergency. Plenty of police on the streets where the people accumulate on weekends, and security cameras are at the entrance of almost every building.

Voed most interactive greek community in 2010, and 2011 this is due to the large number of participants as well as the many opportunities for paired events with the option to lead if you have the talents to do so.

If you have a hobby, well... theres a club for that! With so many choices it makes it too easy to meet people who enjoy doing the same things as you. Also club fest is hosted in the fall and spring giving students a chance to meet members on the board for these clubs to find out more before actually joining.

Iowa State would be great for you if you love to meet people quickly and have a sense of home feeling even when your at school. It is difficult coursework but I am sure if you are outgoing and determined not only will you find friends to help you through but if the faculty sees you are giving it everything you have then they as well will likely come to your aid.

The campanile is the center piece of the school which is a clock tower that stands 72 feet tall on central campus and can be seen from anywhere. Also, there is V.E.I.S.H.E.A which is the largest student run celebration which is hosted in April every year including: music, parades, entertainment, student faculty tournaments and much more!
Despite the fact I pay out of state tuition its engineering degree is a tough one to match. With amazing facilities and faculty you will end up paying more to live there than to go there!

The city itself play host to lots of great music venues, as well as a conveniently located downtown for movies and food. The bar scene is where many of the student congregate on weekends which allows for any option of crazy or relaxed with almost a dozen different styles of bars on the same street.

Dining centers at Iowa state accommodate and food preference and and amount of people. It is one of the best times of the day, every day when everyone meets at the dining centers to enjoy each others company and wide variety of food. In the centers they have every imaginable food that is rotated so you get many meals from many ethnicities.
Splendid food, Superb location, Well involved. these are three phrases that are essential to becoming integrated into a foreign society where you are expected to function and eventually flourish.

Challenges you to complete many daily assignments, including attendance of class for best grades. Lots of lab and group work in engineering study that is weighted upon you participation within the groups which is then accounted for in accordance with you lab teams assignment scores.
come prepared to learn but be challenged to manage time in comparison to high school. keep your eyes open and nose to the grindstone and you will make it through!

A family community with the size of a city, with opportunity to make oneself into a successful human being. Helping and understand, yet challenging curriculum to expand ones thinking inside and out of the box. Beautiful to the eye and the heart.

textAfterTable: Am learning a lot You learn a lot in college, but at Iowa State you can learn anything you could imagine. The professors are true experts in their fields, and do an excellent job teaching. The living experience at ISU leads to a lot of great insights too, especially if you're living in Friley or Helser Halls. Login to rate or flag the reviews Meghan from Walnut, IL 06/09/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 14 out of 17 people found this review useful. 3 of 266 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Determined, competetive, artsy, engineers, ag students, students who want the real college experience, dance minors Tips for prospective students If you are planning on becoming a design major, BE PREPARED for the difficulty and time-consuming curriculum. I have taken art classes since grade school and I still struggled through many projects. However, you will learn SO much and feel like you accomplished a lot. It is a very competetive
